text:
Hey <@U0862HE47K3>,
everything theme-code related(templates, modules...) can be found in the design-manager.

But please note that in order to be able to modify themes downloaded/bought from the marketplace (as well as default HubSpot ones), you need to clone them.

Best practise for this is <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/customize-your-site-with-a-child-theme|creating a child-theme> from the theme you've downloaded and move all files to the child-theme.

Tip from a developer: If you want to modify the theme a lot, it might be helpful and a time-saver, to customize the code via local-development(recommended for somewhat experienced developers)
Thank you so much, this is really helpful!
You're welcome. If you need dev support, feel free to reach out via DM
Ok will do - working on trying to build the child theme and see how I can create the custom LP in my company's branding
